K12n283u_001:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān janapadacaryāṃ caramāṇo'nupūrveṇa yena vaiśālīṃ (lī)
K12n283u_001:7: tatra khalu bhagavān vaiśālyāṃ viharati sma vādyasvaravṛkṣamūle mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamaṣṭabhirbikṣusahasraiḥ ṣaṭ-triṃśadbhiśca bodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājāmātyabrāhmaṇagṛhapatisaṃhatyā devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyaparṣadā ca parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma |
K12n283u_001:8: atha khalu mañjuśrīrdharmarājaputro buddhānubhāvenotthāyāsanādekaṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-deśayatu bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nāmāni,
K12n283u_001:10: vayaṃ śrutvā sarvakarmāvaraṇāni viśodhayema paścime kāle paścime samaye saddharmapratirūpake vartamāne sattvānāmanugrahamupādāya |
K12n283u_001:11: atha bhagavān mañjuśriye kumārabhūtāya sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu mañjuśrīḥ,
K12n283u_001:14: nānākarmāvaraṇenāvṛtānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ ca hitārthāya |
K12n283u_001:16: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye |
K12n283u_001:20: asti mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmin digbhāge ito buddhakṣetrād daśagaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇyatikramya vaidūryanirbhāsā nāma lokadhātuḥ |
K12n283u_001:21: tatra bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabho nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho viharati vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiśca śāstā devānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān |
K12n283u_001:22: tasya khaku punarmañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carata imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānānyabhūvan
K12n283u_001:25: tadā mama śarīraprabhayā aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāparimāṇā lokadhātavo bhrājeraṃstapyeran viroceran |
K12n283u_001:30: tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me kāyaḥ anarghavaidūryamaṇiriva antarbahiratyantapariśuddho vimalaprabhāsaṃpannaḥ syāt |
K12n283u_001:31: vipulakāyastadupamena śriyā tejasā ca pratyupasthitaḥ syāt |
K12n283u_001:32: tasyāṃśujālāni raviśaśikarānatikrameyuḥ te ca ye kecit sattvā lokadhātau jātāśca,
K12n283u_001:35: sarvadikṣu mama ābhayāṃ spṛṣṭāḥ kuśalāni ca)
K12n283u_001:37: tṛtīyaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate------tadā bodhiprātptasya ca me ye sattvā aprameyaprajñopāyabalādhānena aparimāṇasya sattvadhātorakṣayāyopabhogāya paribhogāya syuḥ |
K12n283u_001:38: kasyaci(t) sattvasya kenacid vaikalyaṃ na syāt ||
K12n283u_001:39: caturthaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāpto'haṃ ye kumārgapratipannāḥ sattvāḥ śrāvakamārgapratipannāḥ pratyekabuddhamārgapratipannāśca,
K12n283u_001:40: te sattvā anuttare bodhimārge mahāyāne niyojayeran ||
K12n283u_001:41: pañcamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā mama śāsane brahmacaryaṃ careyuḥ,
K12n283u_001:44: śīlavipannasya mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā kvacid durgatigamanaṃ syāt ||
K12n283u_001:45: ṣaṣṭhaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvā hīnakāyā vikalendriyā durvarṇā jaḍaiḍamūkā laṃgāḥ kubjāḥ śvitrāḥ kuṇḍā andhā badhirā unmattā ye cānye śarīrasthavyādhayaḥ,
K12n283u_001:46: te mama nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā sarve sakalendriyāḥ suparipūrṇagātrā bhaveyuḥ ||
K12n283u_001:47: saptamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāḥ sattvā atrāṇā aśaraṇā bhaiṣajyopakaraṇavirahitā anāthā daridrā duḥkhitāḥ, sace(t)
K12n283u_001:51: aṣṭamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā yaḥ kaścinmātṛgrāmo nānāśtrīdoṣaśataiḥ saṃlkiṣṭaṃ strībhāvaṃ vijugupsitaṃ mātṛgrāmayoniṃ ca parimoktukāmo mama nāmadheyaṃ dhārayet,
K12n283u_001:52: tasya mātṛgrāmasya na strībhāvo bhavet yāva bodhiparyavasānam ||
K12n283u_001:53: navamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāpte'haṃ sarvasattvān mārapāśabandhanabaddhān nānādṛṣṭigahanasaṃkaṭaprāptān sarvamārapāśadṛṣṭigatibhyo vinivartya samyagdṛṣṭau niyojya ānupūrvyeṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ saṃdarśayeyam ||
K12n283u_001:54: daśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūta--yadāhamanāgate--- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā rājādhibhayabhītāḥ,
K12n283u_001:55: ye vā bandhanabaddhāvaruddhāḥ vadhārhā anekamāyābhirupadrutā vimānitāśca kāyikavācikacaitasikaduḥkhairabhyāhatāḥ,
K12n283u_001:56: te mama nāmadheyasya śravaṇena madīyena puṇyānubhāvena ca sarvabhayopadravebhyaḥ parimucyeran ||
K12n283u_001:57: ekādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūta-yadāhamanāgate --- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye sattvāḥ kṣudhāgninā prajvalitāḥ āhārapānaparyeṣṭyabhiyuktāḥ tannidānaṃ pāpaṃ kurvanti, sace(t)
K12n283u_001:59: ahaṃ teṣāṃ varṇagandharasopetena āhāreṇa śarīraṃ saṃtarpayeyam ||
K12n283u_001:60: dvādaśamaṃ tasya mahāpraṇidhānamabhūt-yadāhamanāgate--- tadā bodhiprāptasya ca me ye kecit sattvā vasanavirahitā daridrāḥ śītoṣṇadaṃśamaśakrairupadrutā rātriṃdivaṃ duḥkhamanubhavanti, sace(t)
K12n283u_001:65: imāni dvādaśa mahāpraṇidhānāni mañjuśrīḥ bhagavān bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhicārikāṃ caran kṛtavān
K12n283u_001:66: tasya khalu punarmañjuśrīḥ bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yat praṇidhānaṃ yacca buddhakṣetraguṇavyūhaṃ tanna śakyaṃ kalpena vā kalpāvaśeṣeṇa vā kṣapayitum |
K12n283u_001:70: tatra vaidūryanirbhāsāyāṃ lokadhātau dvau bodhisattvau mahāsattvau teṣāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ pramukhau,
K12n283u_001:73: yau tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya saddharmakośaṃ dhārayataḥ |
K12n283u_001:74: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra buddhakṣetropapattaye praṇidhānaṃ karaṇīyam ||
K12n283u_001:75: punaraparaṃ bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma-santi mañjuśrīḥ pṛthagjanāḥ sattvāḥ,
K12n283u_001:77: te lobhābhibhūtā ajānanto dānaṃ dānasya ca mahāvipākam,
K12n283u_001:79: na ca dānasaṃvibhāge teṣāṃ cittaṃ kramate |
K12n283u_001:80: dānakāle upasthite svaśarīramaṃsacchedane iva vā manaso (duḥkhaṃ) bhavati |
K12n283u_001:81: aneke ca sattvāḥ ye svayameva na paribhuñjanti,
K12n283u_001:85: te tādṛśāḥ sattvā itaścyutvā pretaloke upapatsyante tiryagyonau vā |
K12n283u_001:86: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaiḥ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam,
K12n283u_001:87: tatra teṣāṃ yamalokasthitānāṃ tiryagyonisthitānāṃ vā tasya tathāgatasya nāma su(saṃ?)
K12n283u_001:89: saha smaraṇamātreṇa ataścyutvā punarapi manuṣyaloke upapatsyante,
K12n283u_001:91: te te durgatibhayabhītā na bhūyaḥ kāmaguṇebhirarthikā bhaviṣyanti,
K12n283u_001:96: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye tathāgatānuddiśya śikṣāpadāni dhārayanti,
K12n283u_001:109: tatra yaistasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyanti,
K12n283u_001:110: teṣāṃ tatra narake sthitānāṃ buddhānubhāvena tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ sumukhībhaviṣyati |
K12n283u_001:111: te tataścyutvā punarapi manuṣyaloke upapatsyante samyagdṛṣṭisaṃpannā vīryavantaḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ |
K12n283u_001:112: te gṛhānutsṛjya tathāgataśāsane pravrajitvā ānupūrveṇa bodhisattvacārikāṃ paripūrayiṣyanti ||
K12n283u_001:113: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye ātmano varṇaṃ bhāṣante matsariṇaḥ,
K12n283u_001:115: ātmotkarṣakaparapaṃsakāḥ sattvāḥ parasparasatkṛtvāḥ tryapāyeṣu bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi duḥkhamanubhaviṣyanti |
K12n283u_001:116: te anekavarṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena tataścyutvā gavāśvoṣṭragardabhādiṣu tiryagyoniṣu upapadyante |
K12n283u_001:117: kaśādaṇḍaprahāreṇa tāḍitāḥ kṣuttarṣapīḍitaśarīrā mahāntaṃ bhāraṃ vahamānā mārgaṃ gacchanti |
K12n283u_001:121: yaiḥ pūrvaṃ manuṣyabhūtaistasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K12n283u_001:128: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ santi sattvāḥ ye paiśunyābhiratāḥ sattvānāṃ parasparaṃ kalahavigrahavivādān kārāpayanti |
K12n283u_001:129: te parasparaṃ vigrahacittāḥ sattvā nānāvidhamakuśalamabhisaṃskurvanti kāyena vācā manasā,
K12n283u_001:131: te ca vanadevatāmāvāhayanti vṛkṣadevatāṃ giridevatāṃ ca |
K12n283u_001:135: tasya śatrornāma vā śarīrapratimāṃ vā kṛtvā tatra ghoravidyāṃ sādhayanti kākhordavetālānuprayogeṇa jīvitāntarāyaṃ vā śarīravināśaṃ vā kartukāmāḥ
K12n283u_001:136: yaiḥ punastasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K12n283u_001:138: sarve ca te parasparaṃ maitracittā hitacittā avyāpannacittāśca viharanti svakasvakena parigraheṇa saṃtuṣṭāḥ ||
K12n283u_001:140: ye cānye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā āryāṣṭāṅgaiḥ samanvāgatā upavāsamupavasanti,
K12n283u_001:141: ekavārṣikaṃ vā traimāsikaṃ vā śikṣāpadaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K12n283u_001:142: yeṣāmevaṃpraṇidhānamevamabhiprāyam-anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena paścimāyāṃ diśi sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātau upapadyema yatrāmitāyustathāgataḥ |
K12n283u_001:143: yaiḥ punastasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhaviṣyati,
K12n283u_001:144: teṣāṃ maraṇakālasamaye aṣṭau bodhisattvā ṛddhyāgatā upadarśayanti,
K12n283u_001:147: teṣāṃ tatropapannānāṃ pūrvakaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ na kṣīyate,
K12n283u_001:151: te anekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyanti |
K12n283u_001:152: apare punaḥ kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu prabhūtadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamṛddheṣu ca kuleṣu upapatsyante |
K12n283u_001:156: yaśca mātṛgrāmaḥ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati,
K12n283u_001:157: tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ ||
K12n283u_001:158: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat-ahaṃ bhagavan paścime kāle paścime samaye teṣāṃ śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrāvayiṣyāmi,
K12n283u_001:160: ye idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
K12n283u_001:164: tat pañcaraṅgikavastraiḥ pariveṣṭya śucau pradeśe sthāpayitavyam |
K12n283u_001:167: anyāni ca anekāni ca devakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi upasaṃkramiṣyanti |
K12n283u_001:169: te ca bhagavan idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ prakāśayiṣyanti |
K12n283u_001:170: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaravibhāgaṃ ca tasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
K12n283u_001:177: yaśca mañjuśrīḥ śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tasya tathāgatasya pūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
K12n283u_001:180: śucinā śucimāhāraṃ kṛtvā śucau pradeśe (nānāpuṣpāṇi saṃstārya nānāgandhapradhūpite nānāvastracchatradhvajapatākāsamalaṃkṛte tasmin pṛthivīpradeśe susnātagātreṇa śucivimalavasanadhāriṇā nirmalacittena akaluṣacittena avyāpādacittena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena (upekṣācittena)
K12n283u_001:182: nānātūryasaṃgītipravāditena sā tathāgatapratimā pradakṣiṇīkartavyā tasya tathāgatasya pūrṇapraṇidhānāni manasi kartavyāni |
K12n283u_001:196: yatra vāyasaḥ sthito bhavati durnimittaṃ vā,
K12n283u_001:198: taistasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā |
K12n283u_001:205: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīḥ ye śrāddhāḥ kulaputrā va kuladuhitaro vā ye yāvajjīvaṃ triśaraṇamupagṛhṇanti,
K12n283u_001:212: ye ca yathāparigṛhītācchisāsaṃvarādanyatarācchikṣāpadāt bhraṣṭā bhavanti saced durgatibhayabhītāḥ,
K12n283u_001:213: tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
K12n283u_001:215: yaśca mātṛgrāmaḥ prasavanakāle tīvrāṃ duḥkhāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāṃ vedanāṃ vedayati,
K12n283u_001:216: yā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyamanusmaret,
K12n283u_001:223: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma-śraddadhāsi tvamānanda pattīyasi yadahaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya guṇān varṇayiṣyāmi ?
K12n283u_001:224: athavā te kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā atra gambhīre buddhagocare ?
K12n283u_001:225: athāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat-na me bhadanta bhagavan atra kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā tathāgatabhāṣiteṣu sūtrānteṣu |
K12n283u_001:228: imau bhagavan candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau pṛthivyāṃ prapatetām,
K12n283u_001:231: kiṃ tu bhadanta santi sattvāḥ śraddhendriyavikalāḥ |
K12n283u_001:232: idaṃ buddhagocaraṃ śrutvāṃ evaṃ vakṣyantikathametannāmadheyasmaraṇamātreṇa tasya tathāgatasya tāvanto guṇānuśaṃsā bhavanti ?
K12n283u_001:235: teṣāṃ dīrgharātramanarthāya na hitāya na sukhāya vinipātāy bhaviṣyati |
K12n283u_001:243: abhūmiratra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ sthāpayitvā ekajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān mahāsattvāniti |
K12n283u_001:247: tasya bhagavatastathāgatasya bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya ānanda bodhisattvacaryāma(ryā a)
K12n283u_001:250: ākāṅkṣamāṇo'haṃ tasya tathāgatasya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā bodhisattvacārikāyāṃ vistaravibhaṅgaṃ nirdiśeyam |
K12n283u_001:252: na tveva śakyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistarāntamadhigantum ||
K12n283u_001:253: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva parṣadi trāṇamukto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃnipatito'bhūt saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ |
K12n283u_001:254: utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat-bhaviṣyanti bhadanta bhagavan sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye nānāvyādhiparipīḍitā dīrghavyādhinā (kṣīṇagātrāḥ)
K12n283u_001:255: kṣuttarṣābhyāṃ śuṣkakaṇṭhoṣṭhā maraṇābhimukhā rorudyamānebhirmitrajñātisālohitaiḥ parivāritā andhakārāṃ diśaṃ paśyanto yamapuruṣairākarṣyamāṇāśca
K12n283u_001:256: tasya kalevare mañcaśayite vijñānaṃ yamasya dharmarājasyāgratāmupanīyate |
K12n283u_001:257: yacca tasya sattvasya sahajānubaddhameva yatkiṃcit tena puruṣeṇa kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā kṛtaṃ bhavati,
K12n283u_001:258: tat sarvaṃ sulikhitaṃ kṛtvā yamasya dharmarājasya upanāmyate |
K12n283u_001:260: gaṇayati yathākṛtaṃ cāsya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā tathājñāmājñāpayati |
K12n283u_001:261: tatra ye te mitrajñātisālohitāstasyāturasyārthāya taṃ bhagavantaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhaṃ tathāgataṃ śaraṇaṃ gaccheyuḥ,
K12n283u_001:263: sthānametadvidyate yat tasya tadvijñānaṃ punarapi pratinivarteta,
K12n283u_001:265: yadi vā saptame divase yadi vā (ekaviṃśatime)
K12n283u_001:266: divase yadi vā pañcatriṃśatime divase yadi vā ekonapañcāśatime divase tasya vijñānaṃ punarapi nivarteta,
K12n283u_001:268: tasya kuśalamakuśalaṃ vā karmavipākaṃ svayameva pratyakṣaṃ bhavati |
K12n283u_001:269: jñātvā sa jīvitahetau na kadāpi pāpamakuśalaṃ karma kariṣyati |
K12n283u_001:270: tasmācchrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūjā kartavyā ||
K12n283u_001:271: athāyuṣmānānandastrāṇamuktaṃ nāma bodhisattvametadavocat-kathaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya pūjā kartavyā ?
K12n283u_001:272: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha-ye bhadanta ānanda mahato vyādhitaḥ parimocitukāmāḥ,
K12n283u_001:274: bhikṣusaṃghasya ca āhārapānaiḥ sarvopakaraṇairyathāśakti pūjopasthānaṃ kartavyam |
K12n283u_001:275: bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ triṣkṛtvā rātryāṃ triṣkṛtvā divase manasi kartavyam |
K12n283u_001:279: ekaikayā pratimayā sapta sapta dīpāḥ prajvālayitavyāḥ |
K12n283u_001:281: yadi ekonacatvāriṃśatime divase āloko na kṣīyate,
K12n283u_001:284: punaraparaṃ bhadanta ānanda yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāmupadravā vā upasargā vā pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ,
K12n283u_001:285: vyādhipīḍā vā svacakrapīḍā vā paracakrapīḍā vā nakṣatrapīḍā vā candragrahasūryagrahapīḍā vā akālavātavṛṣṭipīḍā vā avagrahapīḍā vā samutthitā,
K12n283u_001:286: amāṅgalyā vā saṃkrāmakavyādhirvā vipad vā samupasthitā,
K12n283u_001:287: tena rājñā kṣatriyeṇa mūrdhābhiṣiktena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena bhavitavyam,
K12n283u_001:289: tasya ca bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya yathāpūrvoktapūjā karaṇīyā |
K12n283u_001:290: tadā tasya rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya etena kuśalamūlena ca tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistareṇa tatra viṣaye kṣemaṃ bhaviṣyati subhikṣam |
K12n283u_001:292: sarve ca viṣayanivāsinaḥ sattvā ārogāḥ sukhitāḥ pramodyabahulāḥ |
K12n283u_001:293: na ca tatra viṣaye duṣṭayakṣarākṣasabhūtapiśācāḥ sattvānāṃ viheṭhayanti |
K12n283u_001:297: trāṇamukto bodhisattva āha-nanu tvayā bhadanta ānanda tathāgatasyāntikācchrutam-santi akālamaraṇāni |
K12n283u_001:307: pañcamaṃ cākālamaraṇaṃ ye ca udakena mriyante |
K12n283u_001:312: navamamakālamaraṇaṃ ye kṣuttṛṣopahatā āhārapānamalabhamānā ārtāḥ kālaṃ kurvanti |
K12n283u_001:315: atha khalu tatra parṣadi dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ saṃnipatitā abhūvan yaduta kiṃbhīro nāma mahāyakṣasenāpatiḥ,
K12n283u_001:327: ete dvādaśa mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ ekaikānucaraparivāritā ekakaṇṭhena bhagavantamevamāhuḥ-śrutamasmābhiśra bhagavatā buddhānubhāvena tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyam |
K12n283u_001:329: te vayaṃ sahitāḥ samagrā yāvajjīvaṃ buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmaḥ ,
K12n283u_001:333: yo viśeṣeṇa grāme vā nagare vā janapade vā araṇyāyatene vā edaṃ sūtraṃ pracārayiṣyati,
K12n283u_001:334: yo vā tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyati,
K12n283u_001:340: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ yakṣasenāpatīnāṃ sādhukāramadāt-sādhu sādhu mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ,
K12n283u_001:341: yad yūyaṃ tasya bhagavato bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya kṛtajñatāmanusmaramāṇānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitāya pratipannāḥ ||
K12n283u_001:344: bhagavānāha-tena hi ānanda dharmaparyāyamidaṃ bhaiṣajyaguruvaidūryaprabhasya tathāgatasya pūrvapraṇidhānaviśeṣavistaramiti dhāraya,
